snippet: As unstable as Europe looks at its core these days, the view is even more disconcerting on much of its periphery. Now some experts are warning that weakness there could make matters worse at the center of the European Union.
abstract: As unstable as Europe looks at its core these days, the view is even more disconcerting on much of its periphery. Now some experts are warning that weakness there could make matters worse at the center of the European Union.

headline.main: Europe: Unstable at the Center and Worse on the Edges
